title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
OB: When switching perspectives in the application, the CVS repository view is no longer maximized.
EB: The CVS repository view should remain maximized even after switching perspectives.
SR:
1. Open the application and go to the CVS repository view. 
2. Maximize the CVS repository view. 
3. Switch to a different perspective. 
4. Go back to the original perspective. 

Expected result:
- The CVS repository view should still be maximized.

Actual result:
- The CVS repository view is no longer maximized.
